comments:
I'll include various logs.

Here are the steps that oftentimes leads to this problem:

- start a debug session
- set a breakpoint
- single step a bit
- terminate session
- nothing happens. See tail of debug log I'll attach.
- when I terminate the arm-elf-gdb process, the Eclipse GUI no longer repaints 
and I have to kill it.

?yvind

Created an attachment (id=5718)
Tail of GDB log

.log from session. I can't swear that this exception is related.
